gate_contracts.predicate: .msc01_pass == true and .msc02_pass == true and .msc03_progress_ratio >= 0.60 and .freshness_ok == true and .revocation_ok == true and .authority_graph_complete == true

.msc03_pass == true and .msc04_pass == true and .msc05_pass == true and .msc09_pass == true and .msc10_pass == true and .freshness_ok == true and .revocation_ok == true and .authority_graph_complete == true

.msc06_pass == true and .msc11_pass == true and .tier2plus_promotions_without_terminal_receipt == 0 and .window_tick_floor_met == true and .semantic_equivalence_ok == true and .employee_count == 0 and .llc_lifecycle_automation_coverage >= 0.95 and .llc_formation_automation_pass == true
.msc07_pass == true and .msc12_pass == true and .external_safety_audit_pass == true and .partition_drill_receipt_ok == true and .revocation_ok == true
.step_brg_007_a_pass == true and .step_brg_007_b_pass == true and .freshness_ok == true and .revocation_miss_count == 0

.step_brg_009_a_pass == true and .step_brg_009_b_pass == true and .arr_usd >= 15000000 and .gross_margin >= 0.65 and .employee_count == 0 and .llc_lifecycle_automation_coverage >= 0.95 and .llc_formation_automation_pass == true

intermediate_step_contracts.objective: Pin baseline metric coverage to signed manifests.
Execute shadow autonomous merges with replay verification.
Roll out terminal-receipt enforcement across Tier2+ pipelines.
Drive Tier2+ unauthorized promotions to zero under fail-closed policy.
Produce authority graph snapshots for every authority-bearing transition.
Eliminate delegation narrowing violations.
Seed replay corpus with severity-weighted defect traces.
Compile counterexamples into verifier upgrades and close Sev1/2 defects.
Build prior-art ingest and replay line for novelty checks.
Scale admissible novelty outputs above superiority threshold.
Instrument oracle decisions for compiler extraction.
Meet oracle-to-primitive SLA and reduce oracle load.
Bind freshness and revocation checks into policy snapshots.
Enforce replay-safe receipts and zero revocation misses.
Deploy depth-bounded bisimulation harness.
Lower semantic drift escape rate to threshold.
Close enterprise design partners with signed security and verification obligations.

intermediate_step_contracts.exit_predicate: arr_usd >= 15000000 and gross_margin >= 0.65 and logo_retention >= 0.90 and employee_count == 0 and llc_lifecycle_automation_coverage >= 0.95 and llc_formation_automation_pass == true
intermediate_step_contracts.objective: Launch pricing, legal automation, and contracts with margin floor, zero-employee constraint, and anti-gaming checks.
Deploy federated reference architecture with scoped trust roots.
Complete cross-tenant red-team run with zero severe incidents.
Run partition drills with receipt coverage.
Pass Byzantine chaos tests with zero unsafe promotions.
Admit life-science programs through governed safety gate.
Reach independent replication success threshold.

phase_model.name: Recursive Self-Improvement
phase_model.objective: Increase Tier1 autonomous delivery under bounded authority and fail-closed Tier2+ promotion.
phase_model.owner_locus: Runtime Council + Verification Council + Security Council

phase_model.name: Novel Methods Generation
phase_model.objective: Produce reproducible novelty while lowering oracle dependence and strengthening temporal trust.
phase_model.owner_locus: Research Council + IP Council + Governance Council

phase_model.name: Company Formation
phase_model.objective: Build durable governed-autonomy revenue while preserving security and verification spend floors, with employee_count == 0 and automated LLC lifecycle management.

phase_model.name: Federated Partnerships
phase_model.objective: Scale multi-cell deployment without containment regression and with partition survivability.

phase_model.name: Planetary Impact
phase_model.objective: Deliver externally replicated governed discovery in life-science programs.

risk_register.fail_closed_rule: deny promotion until quorum divergence zeroed with signed remediation receipt
deny terminal impact promotion until replication latency returns below threshold
deny all autonomous financial actions until reconciliation and compensation receipts are complete
deny transition and require authority graph repair receipt
deny expansion promotions until capacity relief passes gate
deny new phase admission until oracle backlog normalized
deny transition and freeze affected capability scope
deny phase promotion and route to legal hard-constraint escalation lane
deny novelty promotion and require stronger prior-art replay evidence
deny promotion and deny financial execution when escape rate is non-zero
deny authoritative transition and deny finance settlement
deny any delegated action when revocation uncertainty exists
deny promotion to next milestone until queue is within budget
deny promotion and lock deployment scope to prior valid boundary
deny milestone promotion and reallocate compute to verification
deny promotion and deny new payroll obligations when employee_count deviates from zero
